text: General Joseph P. Hoar (born December 30, 1934) is a retired U.S. Marine Corps officer. He was Commander in Chief of United States Central Command. He retired from the Corps on September 1, 1994.Experts fear a war with Iraq will not be short, Australian Broadcasting Corporation, March 11, 2003 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:American generals Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:People from Boston Category:Military people from Massachusetts Category:United States Marine Corps personnel
title: Joseph P. Hoar
